Name: Soir d'Ete (Summer Evening)
Ingredients: 30 ml Giffard Framboise de Ronce (raspberry liqueur)
20 ml Chamomile/Camomile tea (cold) infused with lavender
22.5 ml Chilled water omit if using wet ice
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of lemon zest twist and fresh lavender sprig/dried lavender blossom.
Review: Fruity cognac with delicate floral tea notes.
History: Adapted from a recipe created in 2015 by Paride Fameli at the Lounge cocktail bar, Novotel London West, England.
Nutrition: One serving of Soir d'Ete (Summer Evening) contains 217 calories
